original_text: The king of Israel advanced and overpowered the horses and chariots and inflicted heavy losses on the Arameans.
korean_text: 이스라엘 왕이 나가서 말과 병거를 치고 또 아람 사람을 쳐서 크게 이겼더라

sentences.original_text: and overpowered the horses and chariots
and inflicted heavy losses on the Arameans
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 아람 사람들에게 큰 손실을 입혔다
